headline: EBARA DRY VACUUM PUMP 42.2 CFM
description: Dry Vacuum Pump       Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Ebara
Model A10S
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 42.2 CFM (1,192.5 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 3.00E-2(En) torr (4.00E-2 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Duty--Service Corrosive
Motor Horsepower 3 HP
Rotational Speed 3,440 RPM
Oil Type Fomblin TM
Oil Capacity Minimum: 0.40 L (0.42 qt, 0.09 Br gal)
Other Information

Five stage pump
N2 Purge
Exhaust silencer

Condition Excellent
Power Requirements 200-240 V 15.0 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 15.000 in (38.1 cm)
Depth 40.000 in (101.6 cm)
Height 22.500 in (57.2 cm)
Weight 485 lb (220 kg)
